General.Name: Northern Uranium Corp
General.Description: Northern Uranium Corp. acquires and explores uranium deposits in Canada. It focuses on the Northwest Manitoba project located within the Athabasca basin. The company was formerly known as MPVC Inc. and changed its name to Northern Uranium Corp. in June 2014. Northern Uranium Corp. is headquartered in Kelowna, Canada.
General.Address: 1634 Harvey Avenue, Kelowna, BC, Canada, V1Y 6G2
